fixes.name: Delta Down T CAD
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ZN([Delta Down T]*[TO_CAD]) to DAX COALESCE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA_DOWN] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD], 0). Used the raw DELTA_DOWN column for [Delta Down T] and applied table-qualified column references.

fixes.name: MUSH Delta Down T CAD All
